Card.Name: Gempalm Incinerator
Card.RulesText: Cycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Gempalm Incinerator, you may have it deal X damage to target creature, where X is the number of Goblins on the battlefield.

Card.Name: Goblin Lackey
Card.RulesText: Whenever Goblin Lackey deals damage to a player, you may put a Goblin permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.

Card.Name: Goblin Matron
Card.RulesText: When Goblin Matron enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Goblin Piledriver
Card.RulesText: Protection from blue (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything blue.) Whenever Goblin Piledriver attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.

Card.Name: Goblin Ringleader
Card.RulesText: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) When Goblin Ringleader enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Goblin cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Card.Name: Goblin Warchief
Card.RulesText: Goblin spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Goblins you control have haste.

Card.Name: Mogg Fanatic
Card.RulesText: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: It deals 1 damage to any target.

Card.Name: Siege-Gang Commander
Card.RulesText: When Siege-Gang Commander enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens. {1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to any target.

Card.Name: Tin Street Hooligan
Card.RulesText: When Tin Street Hooligan enters the battlefield, if {G} was spent to cast it, destroy target artifact.

Card.Name: Aether Vial
Card.RulesText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on Aether Vial. {T}: You may put a creature card with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Aether Vial from your hand onto the battlefield.

Card.Name: Wasteland

Card.Name: Wooded Foothills
